title: rustc: List metadata fails with class

milestone.title: old 1.0 milestone
milestone.description: this milestone used to be tracking "1.0" bugs in aggregate; we've now broken them down into various maturity milestones so it's no longer relevant.

body:
```
#[crate_type = "lib"];

class foo {
    let mut x: int;
    new(xx: int) { self.x = xx; }
}
```
